description: Try our easy to follow Tomato & Veg Soup with Bocconcini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tomato & Veg Soup with Bocconcini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 220 g La Casa Del Formaggio Cherry Bocconcini

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, reheat the soup. Pour soup into serving bowls and drop the desired amount of bocconcini into the bowls, allowing them to begin to melt. Season to taste and garnish with extra basil leaves.
